General.Name: Zhuhai Comleader Information Science & Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Zhuhai Comleader Information Science & Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells military network information security equipment. The company offers special communication equipment, environment monitoring equipment, information and communication network equipment, network and information security products, and Internet of Things application products; system integration; and technical services. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Zhuhai, China.
